General.Name: Robit Oyj
General.Description: Robit Oyj engages in the design, manufacture, and sale of drilling consumables for applications in mining, quarrying, construction, and well drilling industries in Finland. The company's top hammer drilling products include button bits; overburden drilling bits; reaming equipment, including adapters, reamers, and dome reamers; rods, which include standard mm and mf rods, fully carburized mm and mf rods, and drifter rods; shanks; couplings sleeves and adapters, rox and rings, and drill tubes, as well as top hammer accessories, such as guide and button bit adapters, and grinding cups. Its DTH drilling products comprise hyper hammers, D-hammers, RC hammers, BR hammers, shock absorbers, and spare parts; DTH bits and drill pipes. It also provides casing system products, such as Prime system, Steel Fist system, DTH NOVA, Overburden Eccentric System, Solitary ring system, and DTH-ROX Multi-Use system for down the hole hammer; and offers subs, adapters, and check valves, as well as rotatory drill, drag, and RC bits. Robit Oyj was founded in 1985 and is based in Lempäälä, Finland.

7.Name: Mr. David  Delorme
7.Title: VP of Americas and Gen. Mang. of Robit Inc
